Name: Forest's Curse
Effect: Single Target. Add the Grass Type to the Target's Type. (ie Pikachu will now be "Electric/Grass", Charizard will not be "Fire/Flying/Grass") If the Target already has a third Type attached, replace it.
Description: The user calls the forest to lay a curse upon the target, making it grow vines and vegetation around its whole body. The curse will not be easily lifted without a medium's help.
